testsuite.name: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I open the Search User page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I check if user "sam" exists, if not, I create the user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the Register Users menu item
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the Advanced Search link on the Register Users page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I enter "sam" into the User Login textbox on the Register Users page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the Search button on the Register Users page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I select the user "sam" in the list of users to add
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the Register button on the Register Users page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then The users were successfully registered in the class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Improvised A1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Improvised A1" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I select "Improvised A1 - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I put "sam" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "Improvised A1" for user "sam"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I see my total score "0/1.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I see the Delete Record button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I click the edit total score button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I enter "1" into the total score edit text box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I save the total score
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I see my total score "1.00/1.00"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I select the question "Q1" on the gradebook details page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I choose to update grade for question "Q1" to "0.5"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I click the "Save Question Grades" button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I see my total score "0.50/1.00"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: When I click the edit total score button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I enter "0.75" into the total score edit text box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: And I save the total score
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record

testcase.name: Then I see my total score "0.75/1.00"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Update score for improvised record
